snippet: The composer of “Wicked” and “Pippin” is writing the score for “Schikaneder,” which will have its premiere in Vienna.
abstract: The composer of “Wicked” and “Pippin” is writing the score for “Schikaneder,” which will have its premiere in Vienna.

headline.main: Coming From Stephen Schwartz: A Musical About an Opera Impresario -- in German
headline.print_headline: Stephen Schwartz Plans A Musical in German
